text: 7:22: Isa 35:5,6; Isa 61:1Hanchu, John ruoisingei kôma, “Se nôk ungla, John kôma, nin mu ngei le nin riet ngei hah va ril roi, mitchongeiin an mu theia, kholrangei an lôn thei zoi, aphârngei an inthienga7:22: inthienga: 5:12 en roh, kuorsetngei kuor avâra, mithingei aringin an inthoi nôka, inriengngei kôma Thurchi Sa misîr ani zoi.
